content:
derer-mark="true"><FlightSegmentType> = “WK” then “WK CONFIRMED“

  • When <FlightSegmentType> = “SB” then “STANDBY“

  • When <FlightSegmentType> = “ATK” then “AKTP CONFIRMED“

  • When <FlightSegmentType> = “SC” then “SCHEDULE CHANGE“

  • When <FlightSegmentType> = “TC” then “TIME CHANGE“

  • When <FlightSegmentType> = “X” then “CANCELLED“ else “OTHER“

    • | |flightId| | |Data Handling Operation| |pnrFlightId| | |Data Handling Operation| |udorLocal|`pnrretrieve`|`......`| | |carrier|`pnrretrieve`|`......`| | |flightNumber|`pnrretrieve`|`......`|| |departureAirport|`pnrretrieve`|`......`| | |arrivalAirport|`pnrretrieve`|`......`| | |departureTimeLocal|`pnrretrieve`|`......`,
    `..
